string.name: lock_intro_message
string.font: "Protect your phone from unauthorized use by creating a personal screen unlock pattern. "" "1"В On the next screen, watch while an example pattern is drawn. "" "2"В When ready, draw your own personal unlock pattern. Experiment with different patterns but connect at least four dots. "" "3"В Redraw your pattern to confirm. "" "Ready to start? Touch вЂњNextвЂќ". "" "To leave your phone unprotected, touch вЂњCancelвЂќ.

resources.string:
"Connect at least four dots.
Touch вЂњNextвЂќ when youвЂ™re ready to draw your own pattern."

USB debugging is intended for development purposes only. It can be used to copy data between your computer and your device, install applications on your device without notification, and read log data.
